paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the production and purification of recombinant human transthyretin (hTTR) and mentions the wild-type (wt) and the highly amyloidogenic Y78F variant, but does not provide detailed penetrance data or individual patient information.

functional_data.summary: The Y78F variant is described as highly amyloidogenic, with specific behavior in terms of protein modification and aggregation.

variants.additional_notes: The paper focuses on the production and purification of TTR variants rather than clinical data.
key_quotes: the highly amyloidogenic Y78F variant renders mainly the S-glutathionated form
The amyloidogenic capacity is used as a quality parameter of the different protein batches.

functional_data.summary: The T119M mutation is noted for its structural influence in stabilizing TTR.

variants.additional_notes: The paper discusses the T119M mutation in the context of TTR stabilization.
key_quotes: designed to mimic the structural influence of the protective T119M mutation

extraction_metadata.notes: The paper primarily focuses on the production and purification of TTR variants without detailed clinical data.
